DOC.brief_summary: Aim present retrospective study evaluate molecular factor primary resistance tyrosine kinase inhibitor metastatic non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) patient . DOC.brief_title: Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors In Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
